casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Mary E. BAGNASCHI Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 27, 2018

Deborah G. Stevenson, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Timothy F. Costello, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 180 Conn. App. 835, 184 A.3d 1234 (2018), is denied.
